title: Trump's Crypto Reserve Plan Faces Pushback As Industry Executives Urge Bitcoin-Only Approach
description: Some of the crypto industry's most prominent executives are speaking out against the "crypto reserve," explaining that Bitcoin is the only asset that meets the standards for store of value asset.

title: Donald Trump’s Not-So-Strategic Crypto Reserve
description: When US President Donald Trump picked out a handful of cryptocurrencies for potential inclusion in a national strategic reserve, he sparked a trading frenzy—and questions about who stands to benefit.
